summary: This is an email chain between U.S. Attorney's Office (SDNY) personnel and an FBI Special Agent regarding case file requests. The SDNY personnel discuss whether they have requested the FBI's entire SENTRY file and all 302s related to the Epstein case, and decide to ask again to be safe. The FBI agent provides documentation of Epstein's phone number and last call.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: FBI Special Agent from the New York Field Office Violent Crimes Task Force who provided documentation of Epstein's phone number and last call made.

events.title: Email exchange regarding case file requests
events.description: U.S. Attorney's Office (SDNY) personnel and an FBI Special Agent correspond about ensuring they have requested the FBI's entire SENTRY file and all 302s related to the Epstein case.

keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office (SDNY) was reviewing whether they had obtained the FBI's entire SENTRY file and all 302s related to the Epstein investigation.
An FBI Special Agent provided documentation containing Jeffrey Epstein's phone number and the last call he made.
The email chain indicates ongoing coordination and evidence gathering between the SDNY and FBI regarding the Epstein case in July 2020.
